alternate_ascendancies.flavourText:
A Warden of the Maji has sworn
to walk the righteous path.
alternate_ascendancies.name: Warden of the Maji

alternate_ascendancies.flavourText:
A Warlock of the Mists
 seeks mastery over
the darkness.
alternate_ascendancies.name: Warlock of the Mists

alternate_ascendancies.flavourText:
A Primalist of the
Wildwood answers
to no one.
alternate_ascendancies.name: Wildwood Primalist

ascendancies.flavourText:
What divides the conqueror 
 from the conquered? Perseverance.
ascendancies.name: Juggernaut

ascendancies.flavourText:
The savage path is 
always swift and sure.
ascendancies.name: Berserker

ascendancies.flavourText:
The Ancestors speak 
through your clenched fists.
ascendancies.name: Chieftain

ascendancies.flavourText:
No hunt is complete without
the gutting and the skinning.
ascendancies.name: Raider

ascendancies.flavourText:
A woman can change the world 
with a single well-placed arrow.
ascendancies.name: Deadeye

ascendancies.flavourText:
There are venoms and virtues aplenty in 
 the wilds, if you know where to look.
ascendancies.name: Pathfinder

ascendancies.flavourText:
Throw off the chains
of fear and embrace that
 which was forbidden.
ascendancies.name: Occultist

ascendancies.flavourText:
Feed a storm with savage intent 
and not even the strongest walls
will hold it back.
ascendancies.name: Elementalist

ascendancies.flavourText:
Embrace the serene
power that is undeath.
ascendancies.name: Necromancer

ascendancies.flavourText:
No judge. No jury.
Just the executioner.
ascendancies.name: Slayer

ascendancies.flavourText:
Raise your hand to the 
roaring crowd and pledge 
your allegiance to glory.
ascendancies.name: Gladiator

ascendancies.flavourText:
Champion that which 
 you love. He who fights
 for nothing, dies
 for nothing.
ascendancies.name: Champion

ascendancies.flavourText:
Truth is elusive, yet God has
provided us with all the tools 
 necessary to find it.
ascendancies.name: Inquisitor

ascendancies.flavourText:
Drink deeply from God's
 chalice, for the faithful
 will never find it empty.
ascendancies.name: Hierophant

ascendancies.flavourText:
When bound by faith
 and respect, the flock
 will overwhelm the wolf.
ascendancies.name: Guardian

ascendancies.flavourText:
Death is a banquet. 
 It's up to the murderer 
 to write the menu.
ascendancies.name: Assassin

ascendancies.flavourText:
Everyone knows how to die. 
 Some just need a little nudge 
to get them started.
ascendancies.name: Trickster

ascendancies.flavourText:
The artist need not be present 
 to make a lasting impression.
ascendancies.name: Saboteur
